I have a crawl going that appears to be stuck on a map section of a
site (map to offices, etc).  The URIs are like this:

Last enqueued:
http://www.paintingplusofboulder.com/contact.ivnu?mapAddressIdSel=7406&nav=1&query=screen%3Dmap%26link%3Dmap%26city%3DBoulder%26country%3DUnited%2520States%26event%3Dpan%26height%3D250%26lat%3D366530%26lng%3D-993040%26ml%3D3%26orig_lat%3D400272%26orig_lng%3D-1052583%26orig_name%3D2690%252028TH%2520ST%26si%3D2%26so%3D1%26ss%3D1%26state%3DCO%26streetaddress%3D2690%252028th%2520Street%26width%3D350%26zip%3D80303%26level%3D1%26event%3Dzoom

I'm not sure how to catch/filter for this kind of problem.  Having a
similar problem on a different site with things getting added to a
shopping cart (a cgi script).

Anyone have any ideas?

Thanks,
Rob.
